name: Config-files
tagline: my configs for i3,  and such, and some videogames
body:
### welcome to my github site thingy

### about
im a guy from norway, interested in linux, currently using ubuntu minimal on my laptop (i3 as wm), but experienced w/ gentoo, debian. i play _alot_ of counter-strike and quake.

### whats this repo about?
i made this repository to learn to use git, and to backup my config files for my wm, and my cs config.


2015, aloeveraloverxx
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
